feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:56 a.m. ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 2:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: NW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
